overview: Gnaoua music and tradition was a source of inspiration to various musicians such as Jimi Hendrix, Carlos Santana or Led Zeppelin as well as to the writers of the beat generation and to Jazz icons like Archie Shepp, Randy Weston or Peter Brötzmann.  For the first time a real traditional night long Gnaoua Sufi Ritual (Lila)  was allowed to be captured on video.
title: Tant'Gnaoua
